title: Implement a listener mode for incoming reverse VNC connections (custom ports)
author: copyitright
body_snippet:
<!-- Feature Request -->
It would be very much appreciated if the VNC client supported a LISTENER mode for incoming reverse connections (preferably with the ability to choose a custom port).

iterations.description: Feature request for reverse VNC listener mode allowing incoming connections on custom ports, which is a useful enhancement for VNC workflows

notes:
AI triage: Feature request for reverse VNC listener mode allowing incoming connections on custom ports, which is a useful enhancement for VNC workflows
Approach: Add a VNC listener mode that binds to a configurable port and accepts incoming reverse VNC connections, integrating with the existing VNC protocol handler and exposing port configuration in connection properties
